name: Village clicker (nonygl)
description:
Village clicker is a clicker game where you manage resurses and build you village from 100 people to 10,000,000 people.

The project was created in 3 days period during Unity education at PISMO Novska

Programer: Nino Potrkač

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski

Update: 1.0
